text: On March 22, 2021, a mass shooting happened at a King Soopers supermarket in Boulder, Colorado, United States. Ten people were killed, including an on-duty police officer. The suspected shooter, 21-year-old Ahmad Al Aliwi Al-Issa, was arrested by police after they shot him in the right leg. He was briefly hospitalized before being moved to the county jail. ==References== Category:2021 mass shootings in the United States Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in the 2020s Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in the United States 2021 shooting Category:2020s in Colorado Category:March 2021 events
title: 2021 Boulder shooting
